action.content: Write an XML document describing the release of the latest Google Pixel phone. The document must contain at least three placeholders, such as [price], and you must not use commas in your response.
action.label: context

action.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phone-release>
  <model>Google Pixel 8</model>
  <release-date>September 13 2023</release-date>
  <features>
    <camera>Improved camera with [megapixels] megapixels and [features] features</camera>
    <battery>Long-lasting [battery-type] battery with [hours] hours of talk time</battery>
    <storage>Available in [storage-options] storage options</storage>
  </features>
  <specifications>
    <processor>[processor-model] processor</processor>
    <ram>[ram-size] GB of RAM</ram>
    <display>[display-size] inch display</display>
  </specifications>
  <availability>
    <pre-order>Pre-order starts on [pre-order-date]</pre-order>
    <release>Available for purchase on [release-date]</release>
    <price>Starting at [price]</price>
  </availability>
</phone-release>
action.label: response
